column4: can anyone help me update to pidgin i am using feisty and i can't figure it out
downoad the deb and install it.
go to the link above, download the .deb for pidgin, uninstall gaim, then install pidgin by double clicking the .deb
hey i really hate to bother you again but i just started up the .deb file and it says "Error: wrong architecture 'amd64' " does this mean i can't install it :/
yes... yuou didn' say you were using 64bit.
thats because i didn't know haha but this means i am stuck with Gaim
or try to compile it for 64bit...
or do what you're probably gonna end up doing anyways, download and install 32bit.
i just tried both and they both had the same error
and wha ti actually meant, is what you're gonna do eventually anyways, download the 32bit Feisty, and reinstall ubuntu 32bit... and ditch 64bit
oo i see ok well thanks for your time sorry for bothering you with my lack of knowledge
youd idn't bother me at all... its just 64bit is a pain in the rump w/ ubuntu... its really not quite ready yet
